title: Assistant Teaching Professor
school: Emory College of Arts and Sciences
research_focus_description: Dr. Cuttner's research focuses on distributive politics, governance, and personnel in non-democracies and developing countries. Her research agenda explores the relationships between leaders and their supporting elites and the impact these relationships have on public goods distribution. Her work can be categorized into two streams: distributive politics and governance, and personnel and elite politics. She utilizes formal theory, observational quantitative and qualitative analyses, focus groups, and surveys.
